001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.model.CellLocator;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service.TableImpl;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.TriConsumer;
007
008/**
009 * Functional interface for applying filtering logic to table cells.
010 * Implementations of this interface define how filtering is performed
011 * on specific table cells using a provided {@link FilterStrategy}.
012 *
013 * <p>This interface extends {@code TriConsumer} to allow functional-style
014 * execution of filtering operations.
015 *
016 * <p>Used in {@link TableImpl} and
017 * {@link CellLocator} for dynamic
018 * table filtering.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022@FunctionalInterface
023public interface CellFilterFunction extends TriConsumer<SmartWebElement, FilterStrategy, String[]> {
024
025   /**
026    * Applies a filtering function to a table cell.
027    *
028    * @param cellElement    The {@link SmartWebElement} representing the table cell.
029    * @param filterStrategy The filtering strategy to be applied.
030    * @param values         The values used for filtering.
031    */
032   void cellFilterFunction(SmartWebElement cellElement, FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String... values);
033
034   /**
035    * Default implementation of {@code accept} that delegates to {@link #cellFilterFunction}.
036    *
037    * @param smartWebElement The table cell element.
038    * @param filterStrategy  The filtering strategy.
039    * @param objects         The filtering values.
040    */
041   @Override
042   default void accept(SmartWebElement smartWebElement, FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String[] objects) {
043      cellFilterFunction(smartWebElement, filterStrategy, objects);
044   }
045}
